name: La Casa de los Angeles

reviews.text: Casa De Los Angeles is located on a beautiful secluded beach quite far away from town. In fact on our way there we didnt realize just how far away it was, and our taxi driver didnt quite know where he was going. That was a little frightening. When when we did arrive the staff was very helpful, arranged us cabs and rides into town and helped us with some confusion regarding our reservation and our bill. The beach is beautiful and you'll have it all to yourself. Good for a relaxing stay.

reviews.title: Very Secluded and a nice uncrowded beach
reviews.text: You need to know what you are getting into before booking this location. It is very remote, and you should plan on having a car. Because of nearby construction, the ride in is a bit intimidating, but the hotel is far away from the construction site and it will not impact your stay in the least.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an "eco hotel" with no electricity except in the evenings until 11:00, and no air conditioning. It's worth it to get a sea-facing room, as the breeze is better. On site people are very nice and try to be helpful, but bring your Spanish dictionary! Food was very good.
